subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Aksel Lund Svindal, the reigning World Cup downhill and super-G titleholder, proved once again that he is the fastest man in ski racing, winning with a time of 1 minute 44.5 seconds.
snippet: Aksel Lund Svindal, the reigning World Cup downhill and super-G titleholder, proved once again that he is the fastest man in ski racing, winning with a time of 1 minute 44.5 seconds.
